item.description:
Activity: Hiking Status: OPEN   Meet at 10am, Ranger Station parking lot, for a 5-6 mile loop hike on gentle terrain. Bring water and snacks, and dress for possible muddy conditions. Rain cancels. From Route 495 Exit 2, head north on Tremont Street to South Carver, and turn right on Cranberry Road. Follow for about 1.5 miles to a parking lot on the left. See link below for more info. Call L's cell phone before hike: 978-478-7106.   Related Website(s): http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/southeast/mssf.htm

 

  Date(s): April 07, 2011 (Thu) Location: S Carver,  Massachusetts, Southeast (excluding Cape),  MA MA Sponsoring Chapter: Southeastern Massachusetts Leader: Ellie MacPherson 
508-224-6465 
elliemacp@comcast.net Leader: Ellie MacPherson 
978-478-7106 
Registration is not required for this trip. However, you may wish to contact us if you have any questions.

The trip is rated "B3C" by the AMC, which describes a 5-8 mile hike at a 1.2-2.0 mph (moderate) pace over "average" terrain.
item.why: Chance to meet Appalachian Mountain Club hikers. This is an AMC event, led by an AMC leader. You do not have to be an AMC member. I do not know the planned route but have an email into the leader to find out.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Hike with AMC members on Thursday April 7th
